summary: Allows you to recast certain spells automatically.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Goldenrod][u]Background:[/u][/color]
There are other mods like this one, but they tend to alter the vanilla spells causing incompatibilities with things like SkyRe.

[color=Goldenrod][u]What this mod does:[/u][/color]
This mod allows you to cast certain spells (see below for list) once, and have them recast automatically. It does this without altering the vanilla spells at all.

Maintained spells reserve 2/3 of their magicka cost while active. If this would send your magicka into the negative, all maintained spells are lost and you take damage equal to the difference.

Adds a new power: "Clear Maintained Spells" which does what its name implies.

[color=Goldenrod][u]Requirements[/u][/color]
Latest Skyrim, Dawnguard, and Dragonborn

[color=Goldenrod][u]Installation[/u][/color]
Simply download and activate with NMM.

[color=Goldenrod][u]Updating[/u][/color]
1. Use Clear Spells power in game
2. [color=Firebrick2]Make clean save (this is important!)[/color]
3. Install updated version

[color=Goldenrod][u]Uninstalling[/u][/color]
1. Use Clear Spells power in game
2. Uninstall mod

[color=Goldenrod][u]Compatibility [/u][/color]
This mod will only require a patch for new spells added by mods. If there is a spell pack you want supported, let me know and I'll see what I can do.

Palingard was kind enough to make some patches available located [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78055?]here[/url].

[color=Goldenrod][u]Current Patches:[/u][/color]
Frostfall
Forgotten Magic Remastered

[color=Goldenrod][u]Future Improvements[/u][/color]
1. Add an MCM menu for greater customization
2. Add alternate reservation method that reduces magicka regen instead of magicka
3. Add patches for popular spell packs
4. Make sure I didn't miss any spells that should be maintainable.

[color=Goldenrod][u]Supported Spells[/u] [/color]If you feel I've forgotten any, let me know
[b]Vanilla:[/b]
Candlelight
Oak-/Stone-/Ebony-/Dragon- Flesh
Flame-/Frost-/Shock-/Whirlwind- Cloak

[b]Frostfall:[/b]
Fox-/Wolf-/Bear- Skin
Bound Cloaks

[b]Forgotten Magic Remastered[/b]
Divine/Frost/Storm Armor
Phantom Shroud
Salamanders Touch

[color=Goldenrod][u]Changelog[/u][/color]
02/04/2014 - Fixed Frostfall bug preventing new spells from being recognized. Fixed issue with werewolf/vamplord transformations. Added support for FMR.
03/30/2014 - Initial Release
